attributes.action: Better support for Ltd companies #DISS from the pandemic that include dividends.
attributes.additional_details: To stop businesses, families and livelihoods being destroyed. People’s mental health and whole lives have been destroyed that could of easily been saved through the right channels.
attributes.background: Support fairly and not discriminate against dividend payments for limited companies

rejection.details:
We understand you would like more support for limited companies, however it is not clear what specific kinds of support you would like the Government to provide, nor who would be eligible. 

If there are specific changes you would like the Government to make to existing support schemes, you could start a petition about that. 

In the meantime you might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560845.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
